text: Cristiano Melo Araújo (January 24, 1986 – June 24, 2015) was a Brazilian singer and songwriter. Araújo was famous for the singles "Efeitos" (2011), "Você mudou" (2012), "Maus bocados"(2013), "Cê que sabe" (2014) and "É com ela que eu estou" (2014) Araújo and his girlfriend, Allana Moares, 19, died early on 24 June 2015 in a car accident on the BR-153 at km 614, between Morrinhos and Pontalina in Goiás. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Brazilian singers Category:Brazilian songwriters Category:People from Goiânia
title: Cristiano Araújo
